name: Civic Center
description: Civic Center is a neighborhood in New York City, New York with a population of 3,931. Civic Center is in New York County and is one of the best places to live in New York. Living in Civic Center offers residents a dense urban feel and most residents rent their homes. In Civic Center there are a lot of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and parks. Many young professionals live in Civic Center and residents tend to be liberal. The public schools in Civic Center are above average.
